text: Citigroup Center is a skyscraper in New York City, United States. It is 279 meters (915 feet) tall and has 59 floors. It was built in 1977 and is one of the tallest buildings in the world. ==Related pages== * List of tallest buildings in the world * List of tallest buildings in New York City ==Other websites== * Emporis.com - Citigroup Center *SkycraperPage.com â€“ Citigroup Center Category:Skyscrapers in New York City Category:1977 establishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in New York (state) Category:Buildings and structures in Manhattan Category:New York City Designated Landmarks
title: Citigroup Center
